name: Hallowed Advocate Rebirth
description:
Hallowed Advocate Rebirth is a Story Rich RPG game created for the Indie Game Making Contest: Rebirth contest. The game is about a Great Evil that plans to end RPG life as we know it, cause that's what RPG bad guys do.

You play as Ikirion, the latest in the line of Arynknights, which is the hero created by the gods who is reborn every time the Great Evil rises. You and your closest friend Amikiana embark on a world saving mission to once again stop the Great Evil. Along the way you pick up some unexpected help from around the world to hopefully overturn the repeat of events and stop the Great Evil once and for all.

I wish all other entries the best of luck.  And hopefully, after the contest is over, I can continue the storyline and polish up all the scenes, characters and assets to bringing at least several hours of gameplay.
